title: Tasty Chicken in Yogurt Sauce Recipe
content:
Dahi chicken is very easy to make. This goes well with pulao or roti. This tastes amazing and is easy to make.

 

Chicken in Yogurt Sauce

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 3 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - ½ kg

Yogurt / Curd - ¾ cup

Chilli powder - 1 tablespoon

Kashmiri chili powder - 1 tablespoon

Cumin Powder - 1 teaspoon

Coriander Powder - 1 tablespoon

Turmeric Powder - ½ teaspoon

Pepper Powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Garam Masala Powder - 1 tablespoon

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon

Ghee - 1 teaspoon

Cumin Seeds - 1 teaspoon

Kasuri methi leaves - 2 tablespoon

Coriander leaves - a handful finely chopped

 

Instructions

Mix chicken with yogurt and spices. Leave to marinate for 30 mins.

Heat ghee in a pan, add in cumin seeds and let them sizzle.

Add chicken and mix well for 5 mins.

Now add in little water. Cover and cook chicken for 20 to 25 mins.

Once the chicken is cooked, add in Kasuri methi leaves and coriander leaves.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe
recommendations.content:
Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe is one of the easiest and tastiest recipes you could ever make with leftover rice.  You are definitely going to love my schezwan fried rice.
Fried rice is not only delicious to eat but it makes a perfect lunch box recipe too.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
